response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our premium product, which is valued at $8,000 to both myself and you. Considering its exceptional quality and unique features, I would like to extend an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at a special price of $7,200. This offer is designed to ensure that you receive the best value while allowing me to maximize the return on my investment. I believe this is a win-win situation for both of us. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 7200}
